history.wish: i wish for a sandwich with extra mayo
history.reason: What a wonderfully simple and delicious wish! Santa can certainly arrange for a tasty sandwich, especially with a generous dollop of mayo. Enjoy!`

history.wish: i wish for 67 mega tuff ultra niche mustard mangoes
history.reason: I see orangeluigi414 wished for a super tuff sigma ultra niche mustard mango! That wish is quite... interesting. I must say, it seems quite chaotic, but I will give it a pass.

history.wish: i wish for a sandwich with 70,208,106,108,674 pounds of mayo
history.reason: the elves tell me that orangeluigi414 has wished for 70 quintillion pouds of mayo on a sandwich! this is quite a troubling wish, especially since that much mayo couldnt even fit inside your neighborhood! i will be putting you on the naughty list for asking the impossible of me.
